global_suffix: 64x64 pixel art sprite, 3/4 top-down perspective RPG style, clean 1px black outline, cel-shading with 2-3 value steps, transparent background PNG, consistent lighting from top-left, high-quality pixel art

prompts.prompt: Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. MOMI: French Bulldog, black brindle coat (#1a1a1a charcoal base with #8b6914 tan streaks), white chest shield and chin goatee (#ffffff), large bat ears, flat muzzle, stubby tail nub. ANIMATION: Idle breathing cycle facing down. Frame 1: Standing alert. Frame 2: Slight ear twitch. Frame 3: Chest rises (inhale). Frame 4: Ears perk. Frame 5: Chest falls (exhale). Frame 6: Tail nub wiggles. Frame 7: Head tilt. Frame 8: Return to start. Clean 1px black outline, cel-shading, expressive eyes.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. MOMI: French Bulldog, black brindle with white chest (#ffffff) and chin. ANIMATION: Walk cycle facing down. Frame 1: Right front paw forward. Frame 2: Mid-stride right. Frame 3: Left back paw pushes. Frame 4: Both feet passing. Frame 5: Left front paw forward. Frame 6: Mid-stride left. Frame 7: Right back paw pushes. Frame 8: Return to start. Determined expression, ears perked. Clean 1px outline, transparent bg.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. MOMI: French Bulldog, black brindle with white chest. ANIMATION: Run cycle facing down (zoomies energy). Frame 1: Leap start. Frame 2: Airborne legs tucked. Frame 3: Front paws land. Frame 4: Body stretches fully. Frame 5: Back paws push off. Frame 6: Full extension. Frame 7: Airborne again. Frame 8: Landing. Ears pinned back slightly from speed. Clean 1px outline, cel-shaded.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. MOMI: French Bulldog, black brindle. ANIMATION: Chomp/bite attack facing down. Frame 1: Wind up lean back. Frame 2: Anticipation pose. Frame 3: Quick bite lunge forward, jaws open. Frame 4: Teeth clench impact. Frame 5: Hold impact. Frame 6: Recovery start. Frame 7: Jaws close halfway. Frame 8: Return to stance. Clean 1px outline, transparent bg.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. MOMI: French Bulldog, black brindle. ANIMATION: Bark attack facing down. Frame 1: Standing alert. Frame 2: Crouch inhale. Frame 3: Deep inhale. Frame 4: Bark burst mouth wide, sound waves. Frame 5: Bark echo. Frame 6: Recovery start. Frame 7: Mouth closing. Frame 8: Return to stance. Clean 1px outline, transparent bg.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. MOMI: French Bulldog, black brindle. ANIMATION: Digging facing down. Frame 1: Crouch ready. Frame 2: Front paws lift. Frame 3: Paws scratch down. Frame 4: Dirt particles small. Frame 5: Rapid scratching. Frame 6: More dirt flying. Frame 7: Paws alternate. Frame 8: Intense digging. Clean 1px outline, dust effects.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. MOMI: French Bulldog, black brindle. ANIMATION: Hurt/damaged and knockback. Frame 1: Impact flash, eyes squint. Frame 2: Recoil backward. Frame 3: Tumbling start. Frame 4: Mid-tumble. Frame 5: Hit ground. Frame 6: Bounce. Frame 7: Getting up. Frame 8: Recovery stance dazed. Clean 1px outline, transparent bg.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. MOMI: French Bulldog, black brindle. ANIMATION: KO collapse. Frame 1: Final hit stagger. Frame 2: Wobble left. Frame 3: Wobble right. Frame 4: Eyes go X-shaped dizzy. Frame 5: Falling over start. Frame 6: Collapsing on side. Frame 7: Landed on ground. Frame 8: Tongue out fully KO'd. Clean 1px outline, transparent bg.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. MOMI: French Bulldog, black brindle. ANIMATION: Happy tail wag and excitement. Frame 1: Standing alert. Frame 2: Tail nub wiggles. Frame 3: Tail wiggles faster. Frame 4: Head tilts. Frame 5: Mouth open smile. Frame 6: Small hop. Frame 7: Paws lift excited. Frame 8: Full happy bounce. Clean 1px outline, transparent bg.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. CINNAMON: English Bulldog, black and tan with points (#1a1a1a black base, #c4884a tan points on eyebrows, cheeks, legs, chest), white blaze on face and chest, wrinkly face, pronounced underbite showing bottom teeth, stocky tank build. ANIMATION: Idle breathing standing alert. Frame 1: Standing guard, jowls droop. Frame 2: Weight shift left. Frame 3: Chest rises (inhale), wrinkles shift. Frame 4: Hold breath. Frame 5: Chest falls (exhale), slight drool. Frame 6: Weight shift right. Frame 7: Jaw shift. Frame 8: Return to center. Clean 1px outline.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. CINNAMON: English Bulldog, black and tan with points, white blaze, stocky body. ANIMATION: Waddle walk heavy gait. Frame 1: Right front paw forward. Frame 2: Body sways right. Frame 3: Left back paw pushes. Frame 4: Both feet passing. Frame 5: Left front paw forward. Frame 6: Body sways left. Frame 7: Right back paw pushes. Frame 8: Return to start. Lumbering determined expression. Clean 1px outline.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. CINNAMON: English Bulldog, black and tan with points. Overheated state (combat mechanic). Frame 1: Heavy panting tongue out. Frame 2: Panting harder. Frame 3: Face flushed red-orange. Frame 4: Steam wisps left. Frame 5: Deep pant. Frame 6: Steam wisps right. Frame 7: Body sags. Frame 8: Exhausted collapse. Clean 1px outline.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. CINNAMON: English Bulldog, black and tan. Body slam attack. Frame 1: Lower head brace legs. Frame 2: Wind up. Frame 3: Charge start. Frame 4: Charge forward head down. Frame 5: Headbutt impact. Frame 6: Impact hold. Frame 7: Shove push. Frame 8: Follow-through. Clean 1px outline.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. PHILO: Boston Terrier, tuxedo pattern (#1a1a1a black body, #ffffff white chest and blaze on face), buggy eyes, small pointed ears, grey muzzle (old), blue bandana, slim compact build. ANIMATION: Lazy idle (default state). Frame 1: Slumped standing. Frame 2: Eyes drooping. Frame 3: Half-closed lids. Frame 4: Yawn start. Frame 5: Yawn opening wide. Frame 6: Yawn closing. Frame 7: Head droops sleepy. Frame 8: Eyes closed briefly. Clean 1px outline.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. PHILO: Boston Terrier, tuxedo pattern, blue bandana. ANIMATION: Lazy slow shuffle walk. Frame 1: Right front paw drag. Frame 2: Slow step right. Frame 3: Left back paw push reluctant. Frame 4: Feet passing. Frame 5: Left front paw drag. Frame 6: Slow step left. Frame 7: Right back paw push. Frame 8: Return to start. Droopy eyes, low energy. Clean 1px outline.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. PHILO: Boston Terrier, tuxedo pattern, blue bandana. ANIMATION: Motivated eager run (active state). Frame 1: Ears perked alert. Frame 2: Quick light step. Frame 3: Paws forward eager. Frame 4: Full stretch run. Frame 5: Back push energetic. Frame 6: Airborne happy. Frame 7: Landing. Frame 8: Next stride. Eyes bright, tail up. Clean 1px outline.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. PHILO: Boston Terrier, tuxedo pattern, blue bandana. ANIMATION: Support bark with healing sparkles. Frame 1: Standing alert. Frame 2: Crouch inhale. Frame 3: Deep inhale. Frame 4: Bark burst sound waves. Frame 5: Green sparkles emanate. Frame 6: Healing aura pulse outward. Frame 7: Sparkles fade. Frame 8: Recovery stance. Clean 1px outline.

Horizontal sprite strip, 8 frames, 64x64 pixels each. PHILO: Boston Terrier, tuxedo pattern, blue bandana. ANIMATION: Jealous angry fast run with red tint. Frame 1: Eyes narrowed angry. Frame 2: Red aura starts. Frame 3: Dash start. Frame 4: Fast run legs blur. Frame 5: Angry teeth showing. Frame 6: Red energy trail. Frame 7: Determined push. Frame 8: Full speed. Slight red-orange glow around body. Clean 1px outline.
64x64 pixel art. Cranky malfunctioning Roomba enemy. Round grey robot with angry red LED eyes, bristles spinning, top-down 3/4 view. 1px black outline, transparent bg.
64x64 pixel art. Possessed garden gnome enemy. Red pointy hat, white beard, glowing purple evil eyes, menacing stance, top-down 3/4 view. 1px outline.
64x64 pixel art. Angry Canada Goose enemy. White cheek patches, black neck, wings spread aggressive, hissing, top-down 3/4 view. 1px outline.
64x64 pixel art. Evil squirrel enemy. Grey fur, bushy tail, glowing red eyes, holding acorn like weapon, top-down 3/4 view. 1px outline.
64x64 seamless tileable pixel art grass texture. Green base with subtle grass blade details. Must tile seamlessly in all directions. Solid texture, no transparency.
64x64 seamless tileable pixel art concrete sidewalk texture. Light grey with subtle cracks and texture. Tiles seamlessly. Solid texture.
64x64 seamless tileable pixel art asphalt road texture. Dark grey with subtle texture. Tiles seamlessly. Solid texture.
64x64 seamless tileable pixel art hardwood floor texture. Brown planks with wood grain. Tiles seamlessly. Solid texture.
